data.title: I Code
data.subTitle: About Me
data.heading: Hi, I'm Mayank. I am a full stack developer based out of Pune, India having over 4+ years of experience in building web apps.

content.text: In my small experince of 4 years, I have worked mostly in travel domains building over 4 different travel products in Angular 2+ versions. Apart from this I have also experience in React JS, Vue JS, Spring boot and have build over 3 different enterprise level apps.

My love for work and to explore different technologies help me to keep on going project to project and try on different roles and challenges. I'm a fast learner and quickly adapt to new skills and juggle different projects and roles with relative ease.
Get a detailed info about me in my resume.
